multiFunctionalTool.subText: Software program that scans the blockchain network to gather information about the token.

swapTool.subText: An exchange that allows users to trade one token for another.

wallet.subText: A software program that allows users to securely store, send, and receive.

bridge.subText: A platform that enables the exchange of tokens between different blockchain networks.

cryptoAcademy.subText: An educational platform that provides courses, training.

dex.subText: An exchange that operates on a decentralized blockchain network.
